Usage
=====


**To launch piSTAR Lab, run**

.. code-block:: bash

   pistarlab


Open your browser to http://localhost:8080


**Running piSTAR Lab with Docker**

.. code-block:: bash

    docker run --rm -i -t -u `id -u` \
        --shm-size=2g \
        -p 7776:7776  \
        -p 7777:7777  \
        -p 7778:7778  \
        -p 8265:8265 \
        -v ${HOME}/pistarlab_docker:/home/ray/pistarlab pistarlab/pistarlab-dev:latest
